job.title: Senior IT Infrastructure Expert (Tenant)
job.description:
What will help you to succeed in the role: :
Deep knowledge of Microsoft Entra ID platform operations
Experience building and maintaining operational tooling for secure policy rollout
Strong analytical mindset and troubleshooting skills
Ability to lead operational excellence efforts and align with broader platform strategy
Microsoft Certified: Identity and Access Administrator Associate (or higher)
Clear, concise technical writing and documentation skills
Stakeholder management and facilitation ability
Structured problem solving, attention to detail, and decision-record discipline
Growth mindset, pragmatism, and comfort operating in evolving governance contexts
Responsible and patient, with the ability to undertake routine tasks accurately.
Open-minded and comfortable working within a multicultural team environment.
Ability to embrace change and innovation, contributing to a dynamic work environment.
Ability to travel internationally.

What will be the challenge: :
Own and evolve the operational execution of tenant-wide Conditional Access and MFA policies, ensuring secure, compliant, and observable implementations across the Microsoft tenant landscape. This role leads the development of reusable tooling, supports capability monitoring, and acts as the bridge between operational enforcement and architectural intent.
Key Responsibilities:
Serve as subject matter expert for Conditional Access and MFA platform operations
Lead script/tool development for configuration rollout, validation, and remediation
Establish operational dashboards and reports that surface compliance and enforcement health
Drive root cause analysis and continuous improvement on policy drift or enforcement gaps
Coordinate closely with IAM, Security, and Architecture teams to reflect evolving platform standards
Guide junior team members in tooling use, operational best practices, and script quality
Support readiness reviews, internal audits, and compliance documentation

What do we offer: :
Inclusive and valuing culture
At Riverty, you can be who you are. We strive to create an inclusive environment and an appreciative culture, enhanced by our employee networks.
Health & Wellbeing
Your physical and mental health is important to us. Take advantage of our various preventive care and support services.
Professional and Personal Development
Take advantage of our numerous training and development opportunities. Benefit, for example, from training courses offered by Bertelsmann University, language courses or leadership trainings
Monetary Benefits & Discounts
Know that you're appreciated with plenty of employee benefits & discounts just for you.
Flexibility
Our diverse working models empower you to customize your work to perfectly align with your preferences. Benefit from mobile office, flexible working hours and part-time models.
